== Getting Started with Task Explorer ==

 # Create Task Folder 
   * Right Click on task menu or Using Task Explorer drop menu, Select "New" > "Folder". 

         [http://lh5.ggpht.com/theanuradha/SJyUeZbjWHI/AAAAAAAAAKA/HWuqUQZz6i0/createTaskFolder.PNG?imgmax=400]

   * Add Folder Name and Description ( Optional ) and Hit Finish.

 # Create Task
   * Right Click on Task Folder and select "New" > "Task"
   
   * Select Repository type and Next. 

   * Add Summery And Description 
         [http://lh6.ggpht.com/theanuradha/SJyVwwbCDbI/AAAAAAAAAKI/46i2FZi0GKg/createTask.PNG?imgmax=400]
